meanings.definition: A person who publicly demonstrates strong objection or disapproval.
meanings.sent1: The protesters gathered outside the government building to show their disapproval.
meanings.sent2: Many protesters marched peacefully in the streets to voice their objections.
meanings.sent3: The protesters held up signs with funny messages to express their disapproval.
meanings.sent4: The sea of protesters flooded the city, a powerful wave of objection.
meanings.sent5: The image of the protesters chanting will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in protests or demonstrations.
meanings.sent1: During the rally, the protesters raised their voices for change.
meanings.sent2: The protesters peacefully assembled in the park to make their voices heard.
meanings.sent3: The protesters wore colorful hats to stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The protesters were like a flock of birds, moving together towards their goal.
meanings.sent5: The determination of the protesters was palpable in the air.
